comments: Please take him!!!!! This guy is awesome. He is very intelligent and chill so its not a difficult class to pass. The subjects he chooses to talk about are real life situations going on around us and can be controversial so if you get heated easily maybe don\'t take him. He is a cool guy and if you do the few essays he assigned. He inspired me 4sur

comments: Paul was super easy, really nice guy too. He likes to be on the opposite end of an argument about very controversial topics just to get you talking about it. Not going to lie this class is pretty boring and you don\'t do much but what videos bit it was super easy. Only 3 papers and the rest of the grading is response questions to articles. Easy A

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
stu_tags: HILARIOUS  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  SO MANY PAPERS
comments: He\'s a really good teacher, he used a lot of current events and we watched a lot of TED Talks and Youtube videos. I liked that what he talked about was relevant and got you thinking. If you miss a class here and there you should be fine, just make sure you have someone in class tell you if there was homework. A few 5 page Essays, not much else.

comments: Learned so much about the world in his class. Makes you think deeply about controversial topics and encourages debate in a respectful way. Interesting to listen to and a very fair grader. Slightly unorganized but give updated syllabus every couple weeks

comments: don\'t really have a problem with the guy except that if you\'re trans he\'s sorta really not. all that understanding and i can\'t tell if it\'s because he doesn\'t know what he\'s talking about or just doesn\'t care

comments: I took Professor Portgues and he was great! The class was extremely easy and fun. He encouraged the class to express their opinion in class discussions. I usually hate class discussions but he made it interesting with the topics he chose to talk about! I recommend taking him!

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: He\'s real. Gives his opinion to you straight. Likes interaction and will call on students for opinions. Likes to play devils advocate. I love him he\'s great. show up, do what is expected pass the class.

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: He is a really easy teacher. He wants the class to debate and critically think and if your class does not want to be there the class can be boring. He seems like an Ass because he is trying to get you to think and challenge him but most people at cuesta just dont care. it was an easy A

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: I did not learn anything from this class. If you are a girl do not sign up for him. He was rude to all the girls in our class. And if you have conflicting opinions with him, he will put you down in front of everyone. We are able to rewrite any essays for the higher of the two grades so you do not even have to try. Do not take this class!

comments: Creative writing with him was the easiest class I\'ve ever taken. Really easygoing guy and interesting experiences/things that he talks about. Always uses sexual examples hah

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: I loved his class. His class is not a religious class. Religion does bleed into the topic of abortion, but you cant talk about abortion and not religion. I find it refreshing that a class is capable to have a intelligent debate about a heated topic. No one in my class was ever chastised for having a viewpoint different than the professors.

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: hes a great teacher! Every class he makes you think about something new. Basically alot of class discussions,and hardly any work and funny at times. Take him, an easy A!

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: If you are a conservative or a Christian, he will preach against your beliefs all semester. I got a D on a pro life paper I wrote, which deserved a higher grade. So if you have strong religious or political beliefs, sit down and shut up and you should do just fine. On a positive note, if you want a class with no homework, pick this one.

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: Took 201A and 201C. Easiest teacher out there. Wrote three papers the whole class while keeping a journal every class period, with responses to his own poetry or other topics. Do not buy the required books, you never read them. He likes controversy so write your essays on sex drugs and anything taboo. He loved me and i got an A+ both semesters.

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: Loved his class. Rich and varied discussions and topics. Enjoyed his style and the relevant current and historical issues he brought to class. One of my all time favorites.

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: Portuges is a great teacher! He is helpful and his class isn\'t difficult as long as you show up for class. He makes you write about 4 essays for the whole semester and he will let you re write them for a better grade. I ended up taking his class again for 201 C and it was also a very good class. I highly suggest taking his class!

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: Very engaging class. It completely held my attention and there was a lot of student participation. It was a fun way to learn about critical events that are affecting our world right now, and I remember everything that I studied.

tag_professor: Inspirational (2)  Participation matters (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Hilarious (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: Overall fantastic teacher. His class is decent in difficulty, but what he lacks in ease, he more than makes up for in clever class conversation. Of all my years in school, I enjoyed his class more than any I\'ve taken. His wit eased the controversial topics we assessed. This teacher is far from the easiest, but is definately worth taking!!!
